long_description: From boxes to rails to cliffs in the backcountry, the Line Pin ski poles get the job done right. Durable aluminium poles feel light in the hands. Thin, sticky grips won't slip as you charge the terrain park. Tab on top of grip fit into your hands between your thumb and first finger and makes 5-finger grabs a bit more manageable. The Line Pin ski poles feature small baskets that are best for packed snow.
short_description: From boxes to rails to cliffs in the backcountry, the Line Pin ski poles get the job done right.
